items.content_html: #Virtual Assistant Using #Jarvis A web-based assistant built with #HTML, #CSS, and #JavaScript. It uses #WebSpeechAPI for voice recognition and text-to-speech, enabling features like voice commands, task handling, and dynamic responses. Lightweight, fully browser-based, and perfect for exploring interactive front-end development.
